snippet.title: Turnbull treats refugees as cattle: Greens
snippet.content: Malcolm Turnbull's leaked phone call with Donald Trump is proof the Australian government trades refugees like cattle, Greens immigration spokesman Nick McKim says. A full transcript of the leaders' colourful January conversation was published on Thursday, with the US president praising his Australian counterpart for being "worse than I am" when it came to refusing refugees. "The Australian people do not want to see other human beings treated like cattle and traded in the marketplace," Senator McKim said in Hobart. (C) AAP 2017
